root: ^“Man, this nightclub’s so stingy! Who even cares if we don’t have enough sequins on our shirts? “
^“And how on earth is this outfit unoriginal?”
^“That was rough. Guess this really is a high-end place.”
^I wonder what they're talking about. “What’s up, dudes?”
^Oh no. They can’t have guessed already, have they? Surely there’s a natural-sounding response to this…
^“Planet earth, of course, just like you.”
^“Oh great, a hippie tourist. Just when I thought this day couldn’t get any worse…”

nightclub: ^“What is this nightclub you speak of?”
^“What? Oh, you mean where? It’s just to the left across the street. You literally can’t miss it.”

^Knowing human architecture, I’m sure I can. These buildings are so flat and thin, and their signs make no sense. I walked up and down the street for so long looking for the fifth avenue building yesterday.
^“From looking at you, you might have better luck getting in than us.”
^“Thank you, my friend. Well, I should be off. I will go to the shiny building you talked about.”
^“Naw, don’t bother. The snobs over there’d never welcome someone like you.”
^“You really think you can get into one of the best nightclubs in town wearing dirty jeans and a t-shirt? Forget it.”
^“To be fair, he’s not wrong. You better have a change of clothes ready.”
dismiss: ^“Urgh, don’t even bother. I bet he’s high. I hate these fucking tourists…”
^“Hey, chill out dude. We’ll get in next time.”
^They don’t seem to be paying any more attention.
